required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Liquid Nutritional Supplement on Malnutrition Hospitalized Patient
clinical_study.official_title: Effectivity of Liquid Nutritional Supplementation in Improving Nutritional Status of Hospitalized Malnutrition Patients: A Single-Blind Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to know the effectivity of liquid nutritional supplementation in malnutrition hospitalized patients

primary_outcome.description: BMI was assessed from height and body calculation. Classification of BMI is based on World Health Organization (WHO) classification.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of Subjective Global Assessment (SGA) rank
secondary_outcome.description: SGA rank is classified to A (well nourished), B (moderately malnourished) and C (severely malnourished) and these option are chosen based on history and physical examination that are stated in the SGA form.
Body fat percentage is assessed by Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis (BIA)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of handgrip strength test score
secondary_outcome.description: Handgrip strength is assessed by handgrip strength score.
Hemoglobin level is obtain from laboratory test
Prealbumin level is obtain from laboratory test

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN) level
secondary_outcome.description: BUN level is obtain from laboratory test
Lipid profile level is obtain from laboratory test
Blood glucose level is obtain from laboratory test

arm_group.arm_group_label: Liquid Nutritional Supplement from Hospital Product
arm_group.description: This group received liquid nutritional supplement from hospital product. The product is in a form of low lactose milk ready to drink with volume 200 ml and will be given 2 times daily for 14 days. This product is consist of 1.017 kcal/ml, 10 vitamin and 9 mineral
This group received standard liquid nutritional supplement as a placebo. Placebo will be given 2 times daily for 14 days

intervention.intervention_name: Liquid Nutritional Supplement from Hospital Product
intervention.description: Liquid Nutritional Supplement from Hospital Product is given 2 times daily for 14 days
intervention.arm_group_label: Liquid Nutritional Supplement from Hospital Product

intervention.description: Standard nutritional supplement is given 2 times daily as placebo for 14 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- aged â‰¥ 18 years old to 60 years old
- malnutrition hospitalized patient based on European Society for Clinical Nutrition and Metabolism (ESPEN) 2015 criteria
- agreed to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- malignancy
- chronic kidney disease stage III-V
- decompensated hepatic cirrhosis
- allergic to milk or lactose intolerance
- could not be randomised and participate in this study by clinical judgement
